name: Where's Lebron?
description:
Where's Lebron is styled like a classic 2D platformer. You play as a mouse,  jumping in and between obstacles and exploring fun castles. Your main objective: Help Morton, a friendly moose, find his friend Lebron. Morton says that Lebron is probably playing in the castle to the east. Can you make it there and find Lebron? Or will he be lost forever?

This game was made for the MiniJam 54: Memories - A 72 hour Game Jam where the limitation was that the game had to start and end as different genres.

Where's Lebron is not only my first Game Jam project, but my first game ever! I didn't have as much time to work on it as I wanted, but I hope I captured the spirit of this jam well.
